title: Our Royal Patron attends special dinner event in support of young autistic people
desc: We were delighted to welcome our Royal Patron, HRH The Duchess of Edinburgh, at a dinner event entitled ‘Inclusive Futures: Education, Employment, and Autism’.

title: PS3 emulator RPCS3 nears milestone with most PlayStation 3 games now at least 'Ingame'
desc: The developers behind the PlayStation 3 emulator RPCS3 have shared a new compatibility update. This emulation software is now closer than ever to getting all PS3 games not only to boot but also to get past the menus.

title: DOST ready to assist in talks, plans for nuclear power plant initiatives
desc: DAGUPAN CITY, PANGASINAN – The Department of Science and Technology (DOST) on Monday said it is ready to assist in any discussions on tapping nuclear energy in the country.

title: Manchester United: Sir Jim Ratcliffe immigration fallout analysed
desc: Sports editor Dan Roan analyses the potential fallout of Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe's comments on immigration.

title: US immigration lawyer shares tips on protecting Filipinos’ rights vs ICE
desc: Amid the ongoing crackdown by the administration of US President Donald Trump on undocumented immigrants, a US-based immigration lawyer on Monday offered advice to Filipinos on how to protect their rights when dealing with agents of US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE).

title: I replaced Windows with Linux, and there's only one feature I miss
desc: Switching from Windows to Linux is easy, they say. But here's what they don't tell you.

title: Canada set to face Switzerland in women’s hockey semifinal at 3pm ET on TSN
desc: Canada’s women’s hockey team will take on Switzerland on Monday, looking to set up an eighth straight trip to the Olympic final, dating back to when the event was introduced at Nagano 1998.

title: SEC warns public against unlicensed Mekanism Investment Scheme
